sulan widuli bala udyanaya pilibanda giwisum athsan kirime katayuthu 2010 agosthu masadi lanka aayojana mandalayedi siduwunu athara, ehi idikirim katayuthu eeta anugami masadi arambaana ladi. 2011 juni masadi balagaraye nimawum katayuthu awasan kota wiwrutha kala athara, ehi hamastha nimawum katayuthu sandaha amerika dolar miliyana 18.55 k wayawu bawa sandahanya.[1][2][3][4][5] balagaraya magin warshikawa gigawot paya 26.28 ka widyuth bala pramanayak uthpadanaya kere.[6][7]
